attributes.action: Stop companies from adding excessive online booking fees.
attributes.additional_details: This makes the advertised price incorrect as by the time you reach check out there has been additional extras added that are unavoidable. It makes events less accessible, erodes trust between the consumers and the companies. It's exploitative. Prices advertised should be inclusive of any fixed fees. We should have fair and transparent ticket purchasing practices.
attributes.background: Ban companies from adding on a booking fee when purchasing online.

rejection.details:
This appears to be seeking the same thing as another petition which is already open (and which you may wish to sign):

Ban ticket booking companies from charging admin fees
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734672
